name: Ruined (Drk66)
description:
In Ruined you have to dash your way through rusty sentinels in order to find the last espresso machine in the world.

Movement - WASD

Dash - Right Click / Shift 

(Controls are remappable in the options menu)

This game was made for the Wild Jam #35 And the theme was "Lost Tech"

Credits

Programming - Hoimar, Drk, Sebastián Gallardo

Art - IDLEUKE

Sounds/Music - Sebastián Gallardo
